an7.26:1: "Bhikkhus, I will teach you seven principles of non-decline. Listen and attend closely. I will speak."
an7.26:2: () As long as they develop the enlightenment factor of discrimination of phenomena … (3) … the enlightenment factor of energy … (4) … the enlightenment factor of rapture … (5) … the enlightenment factor of tranquility … (6) … the enlightenment factor of concentration … (7) … the enlightenment factor of equanimity, only growth is to be expected for them, not decline.
an7.26:3: "Bhikkhus, as long as these seven principles of non-decline continue among the bhikkhus, and the bhikkhus are seenestablishedin them, only growth is to be expected for them, not decline."
